effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 480,883.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Dr. Scrapheal to heal your target additionally for 207,307.

When a nearby ally's health falls below 35%, Dr. Scrapheal springs into action, delivering instant care to heal them for 808,146. This effect can only activate once every 1 min.

name: Noggenfogger Ultimate Deluxe

spells.description: Use: Summons a Blackwater Pirate to aid you in combat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: With an elixir as unpredictable as Noggenfogger's, you never know if to expect pirates or confusion.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Stormwind.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
